attributes.action: make resources available to implement measures to enforce 20 mph speed limits.
attributes.additional_details:
FOI requests to TVP show how little enforcement has been carried out.
Anecdotal observation indicates as much as 80% of drivers are ignoring the limits with a few injury accidents having vehicle speed as an underlying cause.
attributes.background: Most of East Reading has local  20 mph speed limits, particularly outside schools and in residential streets. With out enforcement the majority of traffic and drivers fail to comply with the limit. Without additional funding most police forces cannot prioritise the 20 mph speed limits

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Speeding is a criminal offence and enforcement is the responsibility of the police. 

You could raise this issue with the Police and Crime Commissioner for the Thames Valley, who is elected, using the following website:

https://www.thamesvalley-pcc.gov.uk/
